remarks: Closure of join operation.  Frequently-used special case of ~ latjcl for atoms.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Jun-2012.)
statement:
hlatjcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
hlatjcl.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
hlatjcl.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
hlatjcl $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> ( X .\/ Y ) e. B ) $.
